software.aizynthcli: A Python library for generating synthetic routes and evaluating molecules
software.SLURM: A workload manager that distributes jobs to nodes in a compute cluster

data.smiles_csv: A CSV file containing SMILES strings of molecules
data.config: A YAML configuration file for aizynthcli
data.output: An HDF file to store the results of the aizynthcli run
data.stocks: A string indicating the type of building blocks to use
data.policy: A string indicating the policy to use for generating synthetic routes
